thread.title: EXCLUSIVE: Kim Kardashian Meets With French Judge in NYC to Help Identify Alleged Culprits in Paris Robbery
thread.title_full: EXCLUSIVE: Kim Kardashian Meets With French Judge in NYC to Help Identify Alleged Culprits in Paris Robbery

author: Jackie Willis
title: EXCLUSIVE: Kim Kardashian Meets With French Judge in NYC to Help Identify Alleged Culprits in Paris Robbery
text: EXCLUSIVE: Kim Kardashian Meets With French Judge in NYC to Help Identify Alleged Culprits in Paris Robbery by Jackie Willis 10:01   Getty Images Kim Kardashian West is working with French authorities to help determine who robbed her at gunpoint while she was asleep in her Paris hotel in October. A source close to the 36-year-old reality star tells ET that Kim met with her attorneys and a French judge on Wednesday in New York to answer questions about the incident, in hopes of identifying the alleged robbers. The source points out that Kim has said that both men who were in the room with her that night had very distinct French accents and were not speaking English. WATCH: Kim Kardashian Reveals She's Reading Book About a Near-Death Experience Months After Paris Robbery Authorities confirmed last month that 10 suspects are facing criminal charges including armed robbery, kidnapping, weapon possession, use of false identity and criminal association. "Kim wasn’t aware of how many people were actually involved in the heist until all the men were arrested," the source explains. "She thought there were only [the] two who were in her room that night." The source adds, "It’s reassuring for Kim to now know the entire scenario." MORE: Kim Kardashian West’s Alleged Robber Claims They Melted All Her Jewelry Except Engagement Ring -- Report While Kim wants to help French authorities as best she can, the source says "reliving that night is hard" for the mother of two. "She wants this to be over, but is happy that justice is finally being served," the source notes. "Kim is very appreciative to the French authorities and everyone who has been involved in finding these men who did this to her. She has been cooperating every step of the way." Earlier this week, a source close to Kim and her husband, Kanye West, opened up to ET about how the couple's latest hardships -- from Kim's robbery to Kanye's breakdown and subsequent hospitalization -- have changed them, both as individuals and as spouses. "[Kim's] re-prioritized everything," the source said. "She’s spending more time with the kids [North and Saint] and she loved her time off with them. She's more [in] mom mode." RELATED SLIDESHOW
